Actions.ActionName: If this is the first backupâ€¦
Remove existing alias (which shouldn't be there, but good to test)
Create the new alias via AppleScript
Actions.Text:
if application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" is not running then tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to launch

try	set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"	tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"		set theLocation to getvariable "rg_MBU_BackupLoc"		set theFolderToAlias to getvariable "instance_TheLatestFolderName" instance kmInst	end tell		set myPath to theLocation & "/" & theFolderToAlias		tell application "Finder"		make new alias at POSIX file theLocation to POSIX file myPath		set name of result to "__latest"	end tellend try
